title: A Village school
creator_credit: Great Britain. Ministry of Information and Colonial Film Unit
brief_description: A study of the school at Ashley Green, in Buckinghamshire, England during World War II, when it was greatly enlarged to cater for children evacuated from London and other big cities.
creator_credit_for_label: Great Britain. Ministry of Information and Colonial Film Unit
